actions.description: The apprentice makes two Exponential Lash attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: {@atk ms,rs} 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) force damage, and the apprentice can cause one creature it can see within 30 feet of the target to take 9 (2d6 + 2) force damage.
actions.name: Exponential Lash

actions.description:
The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
At will: guidance, mage hand

1/day each: enlarge/reduce, mage armor
actions.name: Spellcasting
